remarks:
The union of two ordinal numbers is an ordinal number.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-1994.)

 The union of two ordinal numbers is an ordinal number.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-1994.)  (Constructive proof by Jim Kingdon, 25-Jul-2019.)
